text: "Utah...This Is the Place" is the regional anthem of the U.S. state of Utah. It was written in 1996, and was adopted as the anthem in 2003, replacing "Utah, We Love Thee". The song was made public domain when it was made the anthem of Utah by the composers, Sam and Gary Francis. == References == Category:United States state songs Category:Songs about the United States Category:1996 songs
title: Utah...This Is the Place
